play up.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to emphasize something, sometimes making it seem more important than it really is
play up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Play up your strongest arguments in the opening paragraph.
play up.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if children play up, they behave badly
play up.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Jordan’s been playing up in school.
I hope the kids don’t play you up.
play up.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to hurt you or cause problems for you
play up.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: My knee’s been playing me up this week.
